segments.text: You don't look well at all . Are you sick ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I don't feel well today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long have you been feeling like this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How did you feel at the very beginning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It began with a shiver then I perspired a great deal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . You've caught a bad cold . I'll give you a prescription .
segments.speaker: S1
